model.TemplateMethods

Class SimpleDrink

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.TemplateMethods.SimpleDrink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrinksStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BottleStrategy, TapStrategy

    public abstract class SimpleDrink
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDrinksStrategy
    An abstract tempalte class for simple drinks, i.e. bottled and tap drinks.
